properties.Name: ATC Site 5
properties.Description: In 2022 there was an annual daily average traffic flow of 23,748 vehicles at this site. This is 7.9% decrease on 2021 traffic flow and a 9.5% decrease on 2019 flow (pre pandemic). Further detail can be found below. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QnwuOp5ncXs_YWBbynZodLA3PFvjVLA_8_92TtiJfWQ/edit?usp=sharing

properties.Description: In 2022 there was an annual daily average traffic flow of 13,442 vehicles at this site. properties.Name: ATC Site 614
properties.Description: In 2022 there was an annual daily average traffic flow of 18,910 vehicles at this site.
